title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Raila Odinga, Kenya's former Prime Minister, dies at 80
items.description: Raila Odinga — the towering figure of Kenyan politics who helped usher in multiparty democracy and a new constitution — has died in India at 80.

items.title: ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for verified adults, says OpenAI boss
items.description: CEO Sam Altman says upcoming versions of the popular chatbot would enable it to behave in a more human-like way - "but only if you want it".

items.title: 'He transformed R&B forever' - Stars pay tribute to D’Angelo, after his death at 51
items.description: The Grammy-winning singer, who died of cancer, "transformed R&B forever", says Beyoncé.

items.title: Listen Live: Supreme Court weighs challenge to Louisiana congressional map
items.description: The Supreme Court is considering whether Louisiana's intentional creation of a second majority-Black district violates the 14th and 15th Amendments.

items.title: Hostage families confirm identities of three of four bodies handed over by Hamas
items.description: Hamas has yet to return 21 hostages' bodies as agreed under a ceasefire deal brokered by the US.

items.title: Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
items.description: Officials in Alaska are rushing to find housing for people from tiny coastal villages devastated by the remnants of Typhoon Halong.
